about_the_game:
Spiritus Astrum, or "Spirit of the Stars" is a persistent, open-world, roleplaying sandbox. It features an infinite, procedurally generated universe which players are free to explore without restriction.

This early technical demo of SpiritusAstrum allows players to experience some of what the final game will offer, including survival, crafting, and space exploration.

The Spiritus Astrum Demo is time limited, and features only 60 minutes of gameplay, however players are free to replay the game as often as they wish. There is also no multiplayer in the demo.

Please note that this is an early release demo, graphics and artwork are not final.

Spiritus Astrum is more than a game, it is a world.
